problem.markdown:
>>The supports at the base of an arch or vault must resist only downward forces.<< ( ) True (x) False
[explanation] False - they must support both downward and outward forces [explanation]
problem.p: The supports at the base of an arch or vault must resist only downward forces.

choicegroup.label: The supports at the base of an arch or vault must resist only downward forces.

div.p: False - they must support both downward and outward forces
